tool_description:
(This is a minamal version will get the new one asap) This api is used to extarct a user tweets using only the username we take care of all the scraping process from twitter website you DONT have to provide any cookies or something like that. This api allows you to :
-  Filter retweeted
-  Choose date range
-  Minimum Retweets
-  Minimum Likes
-  Minimum Replies
-  Include Tweets with links
-  Only show Tweets with links
-  Include replies and original Tweets
-  Only show replies
name: Twitter Tweets
title: Twitter Tweets

api_list.name: extract
